content: Analyze existing React app structure and current implementation
Extract key features and logic from existing HTML implementation
Design comprehensive React/TypeScript architecture for the love languages test
Complete the quiz data with all 30 questions (currently missing 7 questions)
Create additional TypeScript interfaces for results and improved type safety
Improve quiz logic to handle question navigation properly and maintain answer state
Enhance results page with comprehensive scoring and visualization
Test the application functionality and fix any issues
Enhance progress bar with better animations and accessibility
Ensure full responsive design for mobile and desktop
Add comprehensive accessibility features (ARIA, keyboard navigation, screen reader support)
Create comprehensive test suite for components and logic
Add code documentation and usage instructions
